headline: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 06, 2026--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) is back in the Big Game for the 13th consecutive year — this time, with the Backstreet Boys to tell America why it’s better over here. Featuring the iconic group alongside cameos from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé, T-Mobile's Big Game commercial explains how when it comes to wireless, people don’t want it any way, they want it that way — with America’s Best Network, the best value and industry-leading benefits, all with T-Mobile.

content.title: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial
content.summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 06, 2026--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) is back in the Big Game for the 13th consecutive year — this time, with the Backstreet Boys to tell America why it’s better over here. Featuring the iconic group alongside cameos from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé, T-Mobile's Big Game commercial explains how when it comes to wireless, people don’t want it any way, they want it that way — with America’s Best Network, the best value and industry-leading benefits, all with T-Mobile.

thumbnail.caption: OMG They’re Back Again: T-Mobile Teams Up with the Backstreet Boys for Big Game Commercial. A reimagined “I Want It That Way” brings the Un-carrier's “best experience” to life, with appearances from Druski, mgk and Pierson Fodé to show why it’s better at T-Mobile

headline: T-Mobile Supercharges Bay Area Emergency Communications Ahead of Big Game
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., February 06, 2026--As hundreds of thousands of fans arrive in the Bay Area for Sunday’s Big Game, T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS), home of America’s Best Network, has engineering and support teams positioned on the ground in critical locations across the Bay Area to deliver the network speed, reliability and capacity first responders and public safety officials rely on. The Big Game and similar events place unique demands on communications and coordination and network performance. Well

thumbnail.caption: T-Mobile Supercharges Bay Area Emergency Communications Ahead of Big Game. Network upgrades, on-site field teams, mobile network assets and drone technology power critical communications during one of the world’s largest live sporting events
